name: imomushi
description:
Caution!
This is not "The Great Adventure of the Cute Caterpillar."
This game is a fall action game with strong peculiarities.

You will have to look at your own past failures and try your best to reach the highest point.
You will still have to do your best to reach the highest point.
And when the going gets tough, your past self will be cheering you on in the present.

No special storyline will be implemented.
But we hope that this experience will remain deep in your memory.
